Translations.Text: Jingwei zhe bi jiang huode chenggong,
[tamen zai leyuan li bi jiang huode] guoyuan he putao yuan,
rufang fengman, nianling xiangtong de shaonu [peiban],
yiji man bei de xian jiu.
Tamen zai leyuan li jiang ting bu dao hui yan he huanghua.
Zhe shi cong ni de zhu [an la] jiang shi de baochou, yi xiang chongzu de shangci.
[An la shi] tiandi wanwu de zhu, shi pu ci zhi zhu.[Fuhuo ri, wei jing ta xuke], renhe ren dou bu gan yu ta shuohua.
Dang jingshen [ji bu li lei tianshi] he tianshimen pai ban suli zhi ri, wei huode pu ci zhi zhu [an la] xuke zhe, cai gan shuohua, shuo shihua.
Zhe shi zhenshi de rizi. Youzhi zhe ke zi ze yige tong xiang ta de zhu de guisu [ru zai chenshi xinyang bing xingshan, zuo zhen xinshi].
Wo dique jinggaoguo nimen linjin de xingfa. Dang ren kanjian ziji [zai chenshi] qinshou suo zuo [shan e] di na ri [fuhuo ri], bu xinyang zhe jiang shuo:“Yaoshi wo yuan shi chentu duo hao a!”
Yi menglie che chu [bu xinyang zhe de linghun] zhe [tianshimen] fashi,
yi qingrou quchu [xinshi di linghun] zhe [tianshimen] fashi,
yi aoyou zhe [tianshimen huo xingchen] fashi,
yi zhengxian qianjin zhe [tianshimen huo xingchen] fashi,
yi shishi an la de mingling zhe [tianshimen] fashi.
Zai na ri [di yici haojiao chui xiang shi], dadi he qun shan jiang qianglie zhendong [mei ren dou jiang siwang],
di er ci haojiao jiang sui zhi chui xiang [mei ren dou jiang bei fuhuo].
Zai na ri, youxie xin jiang chandou bu'an,
youxie yan jiang bu gan yangshi.
Tamen shuo:“Women zhen de yao bei fuyuan cheng shengqian de zhuangtai ma?
Jishi women bian cheng xiu gu hou [ye neng fuhuo] ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Guozhen ruci, na shi yi ci kuisun de fuyuan.”
Zhi ting yisheng nahan [huo haojiao yi chui xiang],
Tamen turan faxian [tamen] si hou you huo zai dimian.
Mu sa de gushi daoda nile ma?
